allow: Bash(venvScriptspython.exe -c "from app.api import jobs; print(''Jobs module imported successfully'')")
Bash(./venv/Scripts/python.exe -c "from app.api import jobs; print(''Jobs module imported successfully'')")
Bash(./venv/Scripts/python.exe -c "from app.main import app; print(''Main app imported successfully'')")

Bash(./venv/Scripts/python.exe -c "
from app.main import app
import uvicorn
print(''Starting server manually...'')
uvicorn.run(app, host=''0.0.0.0'', port=8001, log_level=''info'')
")
